main.name: Misheba Alfred
main.description: I earned my bachelorâ€™s degree in Information Sciences, Information Technology specialty from Moi University  Kenya at the end of year 2018. I have knowledge of both theoretical and practical ability, to help develop new technology to solve many of the problems associated with the current technology industry.
main.bio: During my undergraduate studies, I have enjoyed the opportunity to explore various technologies including PHP,YII Frameworks,Javascript,React Library,MYSQL,NodeJS,Linux Systems,Git,Network-Subneting,HTML5,CSS,Bootstrap,Project-Management,Information-Systems Management,Library And Archiving,Media And Marketing. I have also worked as an Technology intern at Public Works which made me acquire solid knowledge in I.T Support,Network Configurations and Hardware Maintenance and Installation.I have worked as a software intern at Diwecs Business Solutions which has to late, enabled me acquire software engineering skills that can use to solve current Information Technology problems in the market.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions, or you just feel like talking to me, please feel free to drop me a line. If you don't get an answer immediately, I might just be travelling through the middle of nowhere. I'll get back to you as soon as I can. That's a promise! .

education.degree: Bachelors Degree Information Sciences-Information Technology Specialty (Second Class Upper Division)
education.description: Besides the technologies described above,in the about section, I did a USSD system as my fourth year final project.The project is hosted at my github account for more details

Through writing simple code snippets, I was able to fully with the other team members understand the functional programming in the object oriented world of Java.So amazing! The sample code snippets can be obtained from my github account.

testimonials.text: I'm glad that you (Misheba) took up BS Information Technology. Your way of doing things in the computer world has been great . My own perception about BSIT is that it's a combination of Programming, Multimedia, Networking, and Business; which you portray in your work implementation.I am happy
My experience with Misheba Alfred has been the most wonderful.
